oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Historian Dr. Merle R. Eppse and Tennessee Agricultural & Industrial State University Student Group with Nashville Mayor Ben West at City Hall, 1954 February
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Historian Dr. Merle R. Eppse, pictured with a Tennessee Agricultural & Industrial State University Student Group in Mayor Ben West’s office at City Hall, Nashville, Tennessee, circa February 1954. Mayor West is pictured holding an ink pen and a document or proclamation. Dr. Eppse, a distinguished historian, taught history and geography at Tennessee A & I (the school was later renamed Tennessee State University in 1968). Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West, Ben, 1911-1974; Eppse, Merl R. (Merl Raymond), 1893-
